section.title:
Initialize the Installer Environment
In this section you initialize the installer environment and browse to the installation UI.
On the deployer01 node, while logged in as the ardana user and from the ardana user's home directory, enter the following command to initialize the installer environment:
ARDANA_INIT_AUTO=1 /usr/bin/ardana-init
You should see some Ansible playbooks run resulting in green ok= messages and yellow changed= messages. If there are any red failed= messages, review the output of the commands to determine the cause.
On thedeployer01 node, open a web browser and point to: http://localhost:9085 You should see the SUSE OpenStack Cloud Deployer screen.
Select the Deployment Model
section.para: In this section you select the model to deploy the cloud.

step.para: On the first screen (Welcome Screen) of the SUSE OpenStack Cloud Deployer, click Next.

On the second screen (Choose an OpenStack Model), from the list of models, select an option to test.
Click Next.
On the third screen (Cloud Model to Deploy), on the left, under Mandatory Components, select Lifecycle Manager Nodes. On the right, in the Edit number of nodes text box enter: 1.
Under Mandatory Components, select Controller Nodes. On the right, in the Edit number of nodes text box enter: 1.
On the left, under Additional Components, select Compute Nodes. On the right, in the Edit minimum number of nodes text box enter: 1.
